General.Name: Alpha Partners Technology Merger Corp. Warrant
General.Description: Alpha Partners Technology Merger Corp., a blank check company, intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or related business combination with one or more businesses or entities. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.
